mapper.insert: insert into t_user_version (user_id, client, model, os_version, uuid, version, commit_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{client,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_user_version set client = #{client,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os_version = #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commit_time = #{commitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
